verses.verse: מַ֝שְׂכִּ֗יל <S%H4905><s%> mas-Kil, Maschil לְאֵיתָ֥ן <S%H387><s%> le-'ei-Tan of Ethan הָֽאֶזְרָחִֽי׃ <S%H250><s%> Ha-'ez-ra-Chi. the Ezrahite חַֽסְדֵ֣י <S%H2617><s%> chas-Dei of the mercies יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD עוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam for ever אָשִׁ֑ירָה <S%H7891><s%> 'a-Shi-rah; I will sing לְדֹ֥ר <S%H1755><s%> le-Dor to all וָדֹ֓ר׀ <S%H1755><s%> va-Dor generations אוֹדִ֖יעַ <S%H3045><s%> o-Di-a' will I make known אֱמוּנָתְךָ֣ <S%H530><s%> 'e-mu-na-te-Cha thy faithfulness בְּפִֽי׃ <S%H6310><s%> be-Fi. with my mouth

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אָמַ֗רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti, For I have said ע֭וֹלָם <S%H5769><s%> o-lom for ever חֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Che-sed Mercy יִבָּנֶ֑ה <S%H1129><s%> yib-ba-Neh; shall be built up שָׁמַ֓יִם׀ <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim in the very heavens תָּכִ֖ן <S%H3559><s%> ta-Chin shalt thou establish אֱמוּנָתְךָ֣ <S%H530><s%> 'e-mu-na-te-Cha thy faithfulness בָהֶֽם׃ va-Hem.

כָּרַ֣תִּֽי <S%H3772><s%> ka-Rat-ti I have made בְ֭רִית <S%H1285><s%> Ve-rit a covenant לִבְחִירִ֑י <S%H972><s%> liv-chi-Ri; with my chosen נִ֝שְׁבַּ֗עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba'-ti, I have sworn לְדָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid unto David עַבְדִּֽי׃ <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Di. my servant

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- for ע֭וֹלָם <S%H5769><s%> o-lom ever אָכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> 'a-Chin will I establish זַרְעֶ֑ךָ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'E-cha; Thy seed וּבָנִ֨יתִי <S%H1129><s%> u-va-Ni-ti and build up לְדֹר־ <S%H1755><s%> le-dor- to all וָד֖וֹר <S%H1755><s%> va-Dor generations כִּסְאֲךָ֣ <S%H3678><s%> kis-'a-Cha thy throne סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

וְי֘וֹד֤וּ <S%H3034><s%> ve-Yo-Du shall praise שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim And the heavens פִּלְאֲךָ֣ <S%H6382><s%> pil-'a-Cha thy wonders יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; O LORD אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- also אֱ֝מֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <S%H530><s%> 'e-mu-na-te-cha, thy faithfulness בִּקְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> bik-Hal also in the congregation קְדֹשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6918><s%> ke-do-Shim. of the saints

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki For מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi who בַ֭שַּׁחַק <S%H7834><s%> Vash-sha-chak For who in the heaven יַעֲרֹ֣ךְ <S%H6186><s%> ya-'a-Roch can be compared לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD יִדְמֶ֥ה <S%H1819><s%> yid-Meh can be likened לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD בִּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> biv-Nei afflicted אֵלִים׃ <S%H410><s%> 'e-lim of the mighty

אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> 'el God נַ֭עֲרָץ <S%H6206><s%> Na-'a-rotz to be feared בְּסוֹד־ <S%H5475><s%> be-sod- in the assembly קְדֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H6918><s%> ke-do-Shim of the saints רַבָּ֑ה <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bah; is greatly וְ֝נוֹרָ֗א <S%H3372><s%> ve-no-Ra, and to be had in reverence עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all סְבִיבָֽיו׃ <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-Vav. of all [them that are] about

יְהוָ֤ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> 'e-Lo-Hei God צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot, of hosts מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- who כָֽמ֖וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> cha-Mo-cha is like חֲסִ֥ין׀ <S%H2626><s%> cha-Sin who [is] a strong יָ֑הּ <S%H3050><s%> Yah; LORD וֶ֝אֱמֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <S%H530><s%> ve-'e-mu-na-te-cha, like unto thee;or to thy faithfulness סְבִיבוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-vo-Tei-cha. round about

אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You מ֭וֹשֵׁל <S%H4910><s%> Moo-shel Thou rulest בְּגֵא֣וּת <S%H1348><s%> be-ge-'Ut the raging הַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam; of the sea בְּשׂ֥וֹא <S%H7721><s%> be-So thereof arise גַ֝לָּ֗יו <S%H1530><s%> gal-Lav, when the waves אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You תְשַׁבְּחֵֽם׃ <S%H7623><s%> te-shab-be-Chem. thou stillest

אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah Yourself דִכִּ֣אתָ <S%H1792><s%> dik-Ki-ta in pieces כֶחָלָ֣ל <S%H2491><s%> che-cha-Lal as one that is slain רָ֑הַב <S%H7294><s%> Ra-hav; Rahab בִּזְר֥וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> biz-Ro-a' arm עֻ֝זְּךָ֗ <S%H5797><s%> 'uz-ze-cha, with thy strong פִּזַּ֥רְתָּ <S%H6340><s%> piz-Zar-ta thou hast scattered אוֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H341><s%> 'oy-Vei-cha. thine enemies

לְךָ֣ le-Cha שָׁ֭מַיִם <S%H8064><s%> ma-yim The heavens אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- also לְךָ֥ le-Cha אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz; [are] thine the earth תֵּבֵ֥ל <S%H8398><s%> te-Vel also [is] thine [as for] the world וּ֝מְלֹאָ֗הּ <S%H4393><s%> u-me-lo-'Ah, and the fulness אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You יְסַדְתָּֽם׃ <S%H3245><s%> ye-sad-Tam. thereof thou hast founded

צָפ֣וֹן <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fon The north וְ֭יָמִין <S%H3225><s%> Ve-ya-min and the south אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You בְרָאתָ֑ם <S%H1254><s%> ve-ra-Tam; thou hast created תָּב֥וֹר <S%H8396><s%> ta-Vor them Tabor וְ֝חֶרְמ֗וֹן <S%H2768><s%> ve-cher-Mon, and Hermon בְּשִׁמְךָ֥ <S%H8034><s%> be-shim-Cha in thy name יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H7442><s%> ye-ran-Ne-nu. shall rejoice

לְךָ֣ le-Cha זְ֭רוֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> Ze-ro-a' arm עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- have a גְּבוּרָ֑ה <S%H1369><s%> ge-vu-Rah; Thou hast a mighty תָּעֹ֥ז <S%H5810><s%> ta-'Oz strong יָ֝דְךָ֗ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-cha, is thy hand תָּר֥וּם <S%H7311><s%> ta-Rum [and] high יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-Ne-cha. is thy right hand

צֶ֣דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek Justice וּ֭מִשְׁפָּט <S%H4941><s%> U-mish-pot and judgment מְכ֣וֹן <S%H4349><s%> me-Chon [are] the habitation כִּסְאֶ֑ךָ <S%H3678><s%> kis-'E-cha; of thy throne חֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Che-sed mercy וֶ֝אֱמֶ֗ת <S%H571><s%> ve-'e-Met, and truth יְֽקַדְּמ֥וּ <S%H6923><s%> ye-kad-de-Mu shall go פָנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nei-cha. before thy face

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <S%H835><s%> 'ash-Rei Blessed הָ֭עָם <S%H5971><s%> Ha-'om [is] the people יוֹדְעֵ֣י <S%H3045><s%> yod-'Ei that know תְרוּעָ֑ה <S%H8643><s%> te-ru-'Ah; the joyful sound יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD בְּֽאוֹר־ <S%H216><s%> be-'or- in the light פָּנֶ֥יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha of thy countenance יְהַלֵּכֽוּן׃ <S%H1980><s%> ye-hal-le-Chun. they shall walk

בְּ֭שִׁמְךָ <S%H8034><s%> Be-shim-cha In thy name יְגִיל֣וּן <S%H1523><s%> ye-gi-Lun shall they rejoice כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom; all the day וּבְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <S%H6666><s%> u-ve-tzid-ka-te-Cha and in thy righteousness יָרֽוּמוּ׃ <S%H7311><s%> ya-Ru-mu. shall they be exalted

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for תִפְאֶ֣רֶת <S%H8597><s%> tif-'E-ret For thou [art] the glory עֻזָּ֣מוֹ <S%H5797><s%> 'uz-Za-mov of their strength אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah; and by וּ֝בִרְצֹנְךָ֗ <S%H7522><s%> u-vir-tzo-ne-cha, and in thy favour; תָּרִים ta-rim כתָּר֥וּם <S%H7311><s%> ta-Rum bring up קקַרְנֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H7161><s%> kar-Ne-nu. our horn

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לַֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For the LORD מָֽגִנֵּ֑נוּ <S%H4043><s%> ma-gin-Ne-nu; [is] our defence וְלִקְד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> ve-lik-Doosh and the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מַלְכֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H4428><s%> mal-Ke-nu. [is] our king

אָ֤ז <S%H227><s%> 'az Once דִּבַּ֥רְתָּֽ־ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ta- Then thou spakest בְחָ֡זוֹן <S%H2377><s%> ve-Cha-zon in vision לַֽחֲסִידֶ֗יךָ <S%H2623><s%> la-cha-si-Dei-cha, to thy holy one וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer, and saidst שִׁוִּ֣יתִי <S%H7737><s%> shiv-Vi-ti I have laid עֵ֭זֶר <S%H5828><s%> 'E-zer help עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto גִּבּ֑וֹר <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bor; upon [one that is] mighty הֲרִימ֖וֹתִי <S%H7311><s%> ha-ri-Mo-ti I have exalted בָח֣וּר <S%H970><s%> va-Chur young מֵעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> me-'Am. out of the people

מָ֭צָאתִי <S%H4672><s%> Ma-tza-ti I have found דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David עַבְדִּ֑י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Di; my servant בְּשֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> be-She-men oil קָדְשִׁ֣י <S%H6944><s%> kod-shi with my holy מְשַׁחְתִּֽיו׃ <S%H4886><s%> me-shach-Tiv. have I anointed

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom יָ֭דִי <S%H3027><s%> Ya-di With whom my hand תִּכּ֣וֹן <S%H3559><s%> tik-Kon shall be established עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo; with אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- also זְרוֹעִ֥י <S%H2220><s%> ze-ro-'I mine arm תְאַמְּצֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H553><s%> te-'am-me-Tzen-nu. also shall strengthen

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor יַשִּׁ֣א <S%H5378><s%> yash-Shi shall not exact אוֹיֵ֣ב <S%H341><s%> o-Yev The enemy בּ֑וֹ bo; וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> u-ven- upon him nor the son עַ֝וְלָ֗ה <S%H5766><s%> 'av-Lah, of wickedness לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor יְעַנֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H6031><s%> ye-'an-Nen-nu. afflict

וְכַתּוֹתִ֣י <S%H3807><s%> ve-chat-to-Ti And I will beat down מִפָּנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> mip-pa-Nav before his face צָרָ֑יו <S%H6862><s%> tza-Rav; his foes וּמְשַׂנְאָ֥יו <S%H8130><s%> u-me-san-'Av them that hate אֶגּֽוֹף׃ <S%H5062><s%> eg-Gof. and plague

וֶֽאֶֽמוּנָתִ֣י <S%H530><s%> ve-'e-mu-na-Ti But my faithfulness וְחַסְדִּ֣י <S%H2617><s%> ve-chas-Di and my mercy עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo; and in וּ֝בִשְׁמִ֗י <S%H8034><s%> u-vish-Mi, [shall be] with him and in my name תָּר֥וּם <S%H7311><s%> ta-Rum be exalted קַרְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H7161><s%> kar-No. shall his horn

וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Ti I will set בַיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> vai-Yam also in the sea יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do; his hand וּֽבַנְּהָר֥וֹת <S%H5104><s%> u-van-ne-ha-Rot in the rivers יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-No. and his right hand

ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu He יִ֭קְרָאֵנִי <S%H7121><s%> Yik-ra-'e-ni He shall cry אָ֣בִי <S%H1><s%> 'A-vi unto me Thou [art] my father אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah; you אֵ֝לִ֗י <S%H410><s%> 'e-Li, my God וְצ֣וּר <S%H6697><s%> ve-Tzur and the rock יְשׁוּעָתִֽי׃ <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'a-Ti. of my salvation

אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- also אָ֭נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni I בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor him [my] firstborn אֶתְּנֵ֑הוּ <S%H5414><s%> 'et-te-Ne-hu; Also I will make עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon, higher לְמַלְכֵי־ <S%H4428><s%> le-mal-chei- than the kings אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. of the earth

לְ֭עוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam, for him for evermore; אֶשְׁמֹור־ 'esh-mor- כאֶשְׁמָר־ <S%H8104><s%> 'esh-mor- will keep ל֣וֹ <S%H8104><s%> lo will I keep קחַסְדִּ֑י <S%H2617><s%> chas-Di; My mercy וּ֝בְרִיתִ֗י <S%H1285><s%> u-ve-ri-Ti, and my covenant נֶאֱמֶ֥נֶת <S%H539><s%> ne-'e-Me-net shall stand fast לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Ti also will I make לָעַ֣ד <S%H5703><s%> la-'Ad [to endure] for ever זַרְע֑וֹ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'O; His seed וְ֝כִסְא֗וֹ <S%H3678><s%> ve-chis-'O, and his throne כִּימֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> ki-Mei as the days שָׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim. of heaven

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If יַֽעַזְב֣וּ <S%H5800><s%> ya-'az-Vu forsake בָ֭נָיו <S%H1121><s%> Va-nav If his children תּוֹרָתִ֑י <S%H8451><s%> to-ra-Ti; my law וּ֝בְמִשְׁפָּטַ֗י <S%H4941><s%> u-ve-mish-pa-Tai, not in my judgments לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יֵלֵכֽוּן׃ <S%H1980><s%> ye-le-Chun. walk

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If חֻקֹּתַ֥י <S%H2708><s%> chuk-ko-Tai my statutes יְחַלֵּ֑לוּ <S%H2490><s%> ye-chal-Le-lu; If they break וּ֝מִצְוֹתַ֗י <S%H4687><s%> u-mitz-vo-Tai, not my commandments לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יִשְׁמֹֽרוּ׃ <S%H8104><s%> yish-Mo-ru. and keep
